data.title: Puja Sharma

data.text:
Manish Mumbai Professional Females 14/05/2011

Introducing Mumbai based model, Puja Sharma, who was born in Bokaro Steel City,Jharkhand and finished her schooling from there only. Her family has been a great support to her in all the ways. Her role model is her Mother in her personal life and in modeling industry it’s none other than the elegant beauty Sushmita Sen and Indrani Das Gupta as well.

Her humble, down-to-earth attitude and her simplicity makes her a class apart. In her past avtar she was a cabin crew with Jet for a year. After that she came into modeling and has done few tv serials. She wants to be associated with all good ad agencies.

Puja is totally into modeling and acting. Her hobbies include photography, traveling and music. She is also an animal lover. Like any other simple girl she would like to be a perfect loving wife. A long way to go gal!! Wish you good luck!!

Model : Puja Sharma

Date of Birth: 29th October 1987

Height: 5′4″

Weight: 48 Kg

Vitals: 32-28-34 inches

City: Mumbai

Experience : Puja Sharma has worked in tv serials like ‘Devi’, ‘Tujh sang preet lagaai sajna’, ‘Mahima shani dev ki’ as an artist.

She has also done two TVCs for Vatika and Classmate notebook.

Post Views: 213
